title: Duke Basketball Coach On The Verge Of 1,000th Win
teaser: Jeff Tiberii of North Carolina Public Radio reports on the milestone within reach for Duke University's legendary "Coach K."
contentencoded:
Coach Mike Krzyzewski leads the Duke University men’s basketball team into Madison Square Garden this weekend. The legendary “Coach K” is simply treating it as the 19th game of this season for his Blue Devils.

But Jeff Tiberii of Here & Now contributor North Carolina Public Radio, explains there is a milestone within reach: Krzyzewski’s 1,000th win.

  • Read more on this story via North Carolina Public Radio

Reporter

  • Jeff Tiberii, Greensboro bureau chief for North Carolina Public Radio. He tweets @j_tibs.
Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
